title: Jessica Mauboy is 'ENGAGED' to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis
text:
Jessica Mauboy has seemingly confirmed her engagement to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis.

The couple, who have been dating for a decade, apparently got engaged while on holiday in Kalymnos, Greece last week.

According to Woman's Day magazine, Themeli proposed on Palionisos Beach with a diamond ring.

Congratulations! Jessica Mauboy has seemingly confirmed her engagement to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis, amid reports he proposed in Kalymnos, Greece last week

While neither of them has officially announced they are engaged, Themeli shared several photos to Instagram of Jessica wearing her ring.

'My paradise!' he wrote in the caption, prompting friends and family to leave congratulatory comments.

'Congratulations to you both. Well done, Themeli. So happy for you,' one person wrote.

In love: According to Woman's Day, Themeli proposed on Palionisos Beach with a diamond ring

Anything to tell us? While neither of them has officially announced they are engaged, Themeli shared several photos to Instagram of Jessica wearing her ring

Themeli reportedly sought approval from his family in Greece before asking Jessica to marry him.

According to sources, the Australian Idol star was spotted outside a well-known bridal boutique in Kalymnos after saying 'yes'.

Jessica, who is known to value her privacy, has long been the subject of engagement rumours.

'Congratulations to you both': Friends and family left congratulatory comments on Instagram after Themeli shared photos of Jessica wearing what appeared to be an engagement ring

In 2014, the Indigenous singer raised eyebrows when she was pictured on Instagram with a diamond sparkler on her ring finger.

At the time, Jessica's mother Therese slammed the rumours as 'bulls**t'.

'Whatever you read in newspapers or magazines about my daughter getting married it's all bulls**t,' she wrote on Facebook.

'If she was to get married, I would be the first to know. So keep reading bulls**t that's not true.'

So romantic! Jessica was reportedly spotted outside a well-known bridal boutique in Kalymnos after saying 'yes'

In 2016, Themeli moved into Jessica's $1.8million two-level apartment in Sydney.

The following year, the Darwin-born musician told WHO magazine that she was open to marrying the former council worker.

'I love the idea of having children with Themeli. I love the idea of being married to him. We already kind of are,' she said.
description: Jessica Mauboy has seemingly confirmed her engagement to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
